description: This file contains test cases for various React application components and routes, including ProtectedRoute, StorageService, and Sidebar. It uses React Testing Library to render components within a MemoryRouter and performs assertions on navigation and UI elements.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute redirect test
methods.description: Verifies that ProtectedRoute redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.

methods.name: StorageService mock test
methods.description: Checks that StorageService can list and upload items in mock mode.

methods.name: Sidebar navigation links test
methods.description: Ensures that Sidebar component displays the core navigation links.
